ComicInfo.Title: Me for the Unknown [Part 8]; Julio's Day [Part 9]; The High Soft Lisp [Part 6]; Maggie [Part 9]
ComicInfo.Summary:
In Jaime's half: Meet the Chascarrillos! Spend time with the most mysterious family in comics. There's our beloved Maggie, her wacky sister Esther, their goofy brothers Manuel, Angel and Ruben, and of course their classy mom Quina. Find out where Maggie gets it all. Where she learned to say "UTA." On Beto's side, Julio's mother worries about her two sons away working in the city — with all those wicked city women and all. In the concluding installment of "The High Soft Lisp," after Fritz's marriage fizzles she tries again and marries her dream of dreams — Scott the Hog! Plus the next-to-last chapter of the epic adventure "Me For the Unknown."
Story Titles"Maggie" by Jaime"The Soft High Lisp""Julio's Day" by Beto"Me, For The Unknown" by Mario and Beto
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-26 17:11:54. [CVDB124358]

ComicInfo.Characters: Esther Chascarillo, Fritzi, Julio Reyes, Maggie Chascarillo, Mark Herrera, Petra Martinez
